markdown.light:
<html>
<head>
    <title>Plugin Description</title>
    <style>
        body {{  /*主！体！*/
            font-family: -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI","Noto Sans",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif,"Apple Color Emoji","Segoe UI Emoji";
            line-height: 1.6;
            padding: 20px;
            color: #1f2328;
            background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0); /* 透明背景 */
        }}
        h1, h2, h3 {{  /* 标题 */
            color: #1f2328;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #d1d9e0b3; /* 线条隔断 */
            padding-bottom: 10px;
        }}
        pre {{  /* 代码块 */
            background: #eee;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 5px;
        }}
        a {{  /* 链接 */
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #0969da; /* 链接主题色 */
            text-decoration: none;
        }}
        blockquote {{  /* 引用 */
            border-left: 4px solid #d1d9e0;
            padding-left: 10px;
            color: #59636e;
            margin: 10px 0;
            font-size: 14px;
        }}
        p strong {{
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #59636e;
        }}
        code {{ /* 代码块 */
            display: inline-block;
            background-color: #f0f0f0;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            font-family: Consolas, monospace;
            color: #333;
            border-radius: 6px;
        }}
    </style>
</head>
<body>
{contents}
</body>
</html>
markdown.dark:
<html>
<head>
    <title>Plugin Description</title>
    <style>
        body {{  /*主！体！*/
            font-family: -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI","Noto Sans",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif,"Apple Color Emoji","Segoe UI Emoji";
            line-height: 1.6;
            padding: 20px;
            color: #f0f6fc;
            background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0); /* 透明背景 */
        }}
        h1, h2, h3 {{  /* 标题 */
            color: #f0f6fc;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #3d444db3; /* 线条隔断 */
            padding-bottom: 10px;
        }}
        pre {{  /* 代码块 */
            background: #eee;
            padding: 10px;
            border-radius: 5px;
        }}
        a {{  /* 链接 */
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #0969da; /* 链接主题色 */
            text-decoration: none;
        }}
        blockquote {{  /* 引用 */
            border-left: 4px solid #3d444d;
            padding-left: 10px;
            color: #9198a1;
            margin: 10px 0;
            font-size: 14px;
        }}
        p strong {{
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #9198a1;
        }}
        code {{ /* 代码块 */
            display: inline-block;
            background-color: #656c7633;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            font-family: Consolas, monospace;
            color: #f0f6fc;
            border-radius: 6px;
        }}
        img {{  /* 图片 */
        max-width: 100%;  /* 限制图片最大宽度为100% */
        height: auto;     /* 维持图片的纵横比 */
        }}
    </style>
</head>
<body>
{contents}
</body>
</html>
